title: Ariat Men's FR M4 Relaxed Ridgeline Boot Cut Jean
description: STACKABLE BOOT CUT: These bootcut jeans are relaxed through the waist, hip and thigh for the most comfortable fit, all day long; Show off your boots with the stackable design, creating a perfect over-the-boot silhouette with a great fit and unmatched comfort

PREMIUM FEATURES: These work jeans for men have no-rub comfort inseams that prevent abrasion against the skin; Other features include reinforced pockets with coin pocket feature, anchored belt loops, and heavy-duty zippers and hardware

GREAT GIFTS: Shopping for your husband or boyfriend shouldn't be difficult, and with these durable jeans from Ariat, it won't be; Perfect for work, outdoor or a night out, the hard-working man can wear these jeans for any occasion
MADE TO LAST: Made of a premium blend of cotton, the ring-spun denim gives these pants optimum durability; These jeans are made to last and create a western style statement that cowboys are known for

SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions; Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability;
Relaxed through the waist, hip and thigh with a boot cut leg opening Ariat FR M4 boot cut denim combines flame-resistant technology with a great fit and unmatched comfort.
